long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds icons at the end of the Pivotal Tacker ticket. There will be one icon for every day since the ticket was started.

The code is here:

https://github.com/bertrandmoulard/story_time
